notesStmt.note: Margins largely worm-eaten. Writing is occasionally damaged. Folio 1 is a later restoration.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The commentary of Shmuel ibn Tibbon on Ecclesiastes and Sefer yetsirah with Shabbetai Donnolo's commentary.

msItem.title: Sefer yetsirah with Sefer ḥakhmoni ספר יצירה וספר חכמני

collation.p: Quires of mostly 16 leaves. Catchwords and signatures in Hebrew letters at the end of each quire.

history.provenance: Acquisition: Samuel Schönblum: purchased from him by the British Museum on 08 January 1870, folio [233v].
